Posts.Content: I'm going for my 7th rads session this afternoon and wonder if anyone can tell me if a smelly armpit can be a side effect of it. Dident happen till after the 4th session but now know matter how often I wash it the smell is back in a couple of minutes. I havent used deodorant on that armpit for a couple of months now because after the ops I had I couldent but never had any problems with a smell. The washing with simple soap and water was enough to keep me fresh. Its really depressing me now because I am sure everyone I come in contact with must smell it. Has anyone had this and if so was there anything they could do about it. Gail.xx
